revised_title: Closed Equations of Motion for Spontaneous Emission in External Driving Fields
tldr: This paper presents closed equations of motion for the expectation values of collective operators in spontaneous emission systems driven by external fields. The modified Robertson projection-operator technique is used, which considers special initial conditions of uncorrelated and permutationally symmetric atoms. The derived equations provide a connection between the density operators and expectation values, allowing for the study of multi-atom correlations and the behavior of large atomic systems.
